name: Sky Traveller
description:
Sky Traveller has you take on the role of a young traveller traversing floating islands. The goal is to collect as many coins as possible while navigating the map. Enjoy a dark and stormy atmosphere as you explore the map and overcome challenges. This game was made for an assignment project. Enjoy!

Sky Traveller features multiple obstacles.

-Traverse Platforms while avoiding falling off.

-Watch out for islands that may drop from underneath you!

-Jump boost feature to reach those hard to get to places!

-Deadly lasers that protect a precious key!

       CONTROLS

  • WASD - Move
  • Space Bar - Jump
  • Double Tap Space Bar - Double Jump
  • E Key - Interact when prompted
  • ALT + F4 - Quit
